# Gravestone Mixed

As the Gravestone, your role is revealed to everyone when you die.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Gravestones that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the percentage players have of getting Gravestone
  • Impostors can have Gravestone
    • ON: Impostors can become this role
    • OFF: Impostors cannot become this role
  • Crewmates can have Gravestone
    • ON: Crewmates can become this role
    • OFF: Crewmates cannot become this role
  • Neutrals can have Gravestone
    • ON: Neutrals can become this role
    • OFF: Neutrals cannot become this role
